## Fieldwork

```{r}

read.csv(here("data/fieldwork.csv"), stringsAsFactors = FALSE) %>% 
  arrange(desc(date)) %>% 
  mutate(y = glue("{agency}: {project}, {county}, {state}, ({date}). {organization}, PI: {PI}. Weeks: {weeks}.<br><br>")) %>% 
  select(date, y) %>% 
  cv_kable(bib = TRUE)

```
